title: I just saw the newest Trump campaign Advertisement...he says that he will creat 10 million jobs in 10 months...let’s take a quick look, shall we?
selftext:
In his first term? That’s the better part of 4 years...he has “created” 6.6 million jobs. Furthermore,you don’t get to include the jobs you lost due to your mismanagement of the Covid-19 virus.

I really hate living in Pennsylvania when there’s a Presidential Election...every one of Trump’s campaign ads looks like the bottom feeding SuperPAC ads you see...who are loose on facts and heavy on rhetoric.

Oh yeah...one more thing? In the very beginning of the ad that, it said....”Donald Trump DID THE IMPOSSIBLE in his first four years....WTF is he talking about? Dividing the country? Adding yet another handout to billionaires? What did he do that was so....IMPOSSIBLE?
